resources.name: get_student
resources.description:
This * endopoint * allows service users to obtain all students registered in the system.

** Parameters (* Query Parameters *): **

- ** limit ** [integer, default = 25]: An integer and positive value indicating the number of students to be returned.
- ** page ** [integer, default = 1]: An integer and positive value (starting at 1) indicating the page to be returned, thus allowing navigation over several student pages.
- ** name ** [string, optional]: A text with the student's name to be found in the database.

<!-- RESPONSE -->

{
  "data": {
    "alunos": [
      {
        "curso": "Sistemas De Informação",
        "id": 1,
        "nome": "Example",
        "registrado_em": "2020-10-29T22:30:18",
        "rga": "1111.1111.111-11",
        "situacao": "ativo"
      },
      {
        "curso": "Sistemas De Informação",
        "id": 2,
        "nome": "Example",
        "registrado_em": "2020-10-29T22:32:50",
        "rga": "2222.2222.222-22",
        "situacao": "ativo"
      }
    ],
    "count": 3,
    "firts": 1,
    "has_next": false,
    "has_prev": false,
    "last": 3
  }
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: students-api
resources.description: The activity of advanced technology of software development where will be made an API of management of students of a discipline

resources.name: get_student_byID
resources.description:
Get a student's record by passing the ID as a parameter

resources.name: create_student
resources.description:
Create a new student with RGA (academic register general) unique and name , as optional parameter passing course this student and API generates situacion and inserted_at.
